rules_text: Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value less than or equal to twice the number of different mana values in your graveyard.
notes:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BrlnleLhrM-/


Alt_1:
Choose one, then choose one more for every (number) of different mana values in your graveyard. —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target creature.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Destroy target nonbasic land.
• Destroy target planeswalker.
